verses.roman:
e-ṛṇa śodhite āmi nārimu tomāra"
govinda kahe,--jagannātha rākhena mui kon chāra'?

synonyms: e-ṛṇa—this debt; śodhite—to repay; āmi—I; nārimu—shall not be able; tomāra—to you; govinda kahe—Govinda replied; jagannātha—Lord Jagannātha; rākhena—saves; mui—I; kon chāra—the most insignificant person.
translation: "I shall never be able to repay My debt to you." Govinda replied, "Lord Jagannātha has saved You. I am insignificant."
